backend/main.mo: Actor with access control mixin managing user profiles, enforcing permissions, and allowing admins to promote users.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking frontend files and components to implementing the admin promotion flow.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base layer defining light/dark theme CSS variables and applying background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app at #root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with all app routes and wraps pages in the AppShell layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Auth wrapper that shows a login prompt until Internet Identity authentication completes.
frontend/src/components/auth/BecomeAdmin: Button and dialog guiding users through admin token usage or granting admin access if already authorized.
frontend/src/components/common/PrimaryAc: Sticky bottom action bar container for primary page actions.
frontend/src/components/common/StatusPil: Badge component rendering status labels with themed styling variants.
frontend/src/components/common/Wireframe: Card-based section wrapper with title, description, actions, and content areas.
Wraps the main app layout, syncing user role with backend admin status and rendering header, nav, content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/navigation/RoleN: Renders navigation buttons based on the current app role and routes.
frontend/src/components/operator/Downtim: Displays a card showing the current downtime duration.
frontend/src/components/operator/Optiona: Provides a wireframe UI for optional photo uploads with a placeholder preview.
frontend/src/components/supervisor/KpiTi: Shows a KPI card with title, value, status indicator, and optional icon or subtitle.
frontend/src/components/user/UserIdentit: Displays the logged-in user's name and role with a logout button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppRole.ts: Uses Zustand to persist and manage the user's selected application role.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state management via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for fetching and updating user profiles, roles, and admin status through the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based global styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/demoData.ts: Provides demo machine definitions, TPM checklist items, and example TPM submission data.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function for merging Tailwind class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMachinesPa: Displays a machine management page with a list of demo machines and a dialog to add new machines.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPlannedMai: Shows planned maintenance schedules and provides a form dialog to create new maintenance tasks.
Provides a user management UI listing users and includes a dialog to add new user accounts.
frontend/src/pages/auth/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login screen using Internet Identity and redirects authenticated users.
Handles post-login onboarding, including profile setup and role selection before routing users by role.
frontend/src/pages/maintenance/Maintenan: Displays breakdown job details and allows maintenance technicians to update progress and close the job.
Displays a list of static maintenance jobs with status pills and navigation to job detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/operator/OperatorHome: Provides operator navigation to status updates, TPM checklist, and machine selection.
frontend/src/pages/operator/OperatorStat: Shows a success confirmation after an operator submits a machine status update.
Form for operators to record machine status, times, and downtime details with validation before submission.
frontend/src/pages/operator/OperatorTpmC: Displays grouped TPM checklist items with checkboxes, remarks, optional photo upload, and submit action.
Shows a confirmation screen after an operator submits a TPM checklist.
frontend/src/pages/supervisor/Supervisor: Displays the details of a TPM submission for supervisors to review, add remarks, and approve or reject.
Lists TPM submissions with their status and allows supervisors to navigate to approval detail pages.
Supervisor dashboard showing machine status metrics, OEE, breakdowns, maintenance, TPM compliance, and recent activity logs.
Page with filters and a list displaying machines with missed TPM activities, operators, and dates.
Report download page listing various production and maintenance reports with download actions.
frontend/src/routes/appRoutes.tsx: Defines role-based route configuration and provides a helper to filter routes by user role.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility function to read a URL query parameter from the browser location.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Project metadata and feature tracking for the TPM Line Monitor app, including architecture notes and implemented features.
